caption.p: Type of the topological attributes used in this study.

tr.td: Number of Voronoi cells with x faces; where x = 8 to 22
Number of Voronoi cells with characteristics (intrinsic) for corresponding CN x = 8–17
Number of Voronoi cells with the characteristics (extrinsic) for the corresponding CN x = 9–17
Total number of cells with intrinsic Z characteristics
Total number of cells with extrinsic Z characteristics
The combined number of f-edged faces in all Voronoi cells
Voronoi cell indicative of a body centered cubic CN14〈0, 6, 0, 8〉
The combined number of faces of all Voronoi cells
The average volume of potassium atom and sodium atom Voronoi cells
